name: Means of Production
description: Take all cards from opponent's hand and place into yours (And gain $1,000 per card)

immediateEffect.script: int cardsTaken = OpponentHand.Count; Player.Money += cardsTaken * 1000; while (OpponentHand.Count > 0) { var card = OpponentHand[0]; OpponentHand.RemoveAt(0); PlayerHand.Add(card); } Log(PlayerDisplayName + " seizes the means of production! Took " + cardsTaken + " cards and gained $" + (cardsTaken * 1000) + "!");
